metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3163 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The XML-RPC system in Drupal 6.x before 6.38 and 7.x before 7.43 might makeit easier for remote attackers to conduct brute-force attacks via a largenumber of calls made at once to the same method.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3163` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.43-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.43-1').
